text: Hi all, I want to include the default _simple_menu_ module into my template, but where can I edit the json fields for the menu_tree parameter locally? I know I could edit them in the HubSpot editor but that's not what I'm trying to accomplish. `{% module "footer_menu" path="@HubSpot/simple_menu", label="Footer Menu", menu_tree="{{ module.footer_menu_tree }}" %}`
If it was a custom module I would place it in modules/mymodule/fields.json, but it's not.
